snippet: The filmmaker Ross McElwee is trying to connect with the past, and his son, in his latest project, “Photographic Memory.”
abstract: Filmmaker Ross McElwee is trying to connect with the past, and his son, in his latest project, Photographic Memory; film follows McElwee's style of personal documentary, in which he uses autobiographical footage to explore larger themes without scouting locations, conducting pre-interviews or research.
lead_paragraph: The filmmaker Ross McElwee is trying to connect with the past, and his son, in his latest project, “Photographic Memory.”

headline.seo: Ross McElwee’s ‘Photographic Memory’ Captures His Life
headline.main: Camera Angling to Reconcile Then and Now
headline.print_headline: Camera Angling To Reconcile Then and Now
